    Methods in classes that return types with arguments of type ArcTP
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<ArcTP>
    PetriNet.getArcsTP()
    Retrieves all ArcTP arcs in the Petri net by iterating over each Transition and collecting its outgoing arcs.
    ArrayList<ArcTP>
    Transition.getArcsTP()
    Retrieves the list of ArcTP objects (outgoing arcs) associated with this Transition.
